name: This is Your Laser
description:
This is Your Laser is a two-player real-time strategy with puzzle game inspirations developed for PC. The game pits two players against each other to manipulate their laser into their opponent’s base. A polished and balanced competitive experience for both casual and core players.

Features:

  • Command an army of five distinct sea creatures
  • Gather resources to place your troops on the board to manipulate your laser
  • React to the dynamically changing laser paths to protect your own base and destroy your enemy's base
  • Animated 2D art, particles effects, and sounds
  • Full tutorial detailing controls, creatures, mechanics, and strategies
  • Playable with keyboard and mouse, Xbox 360, and Xbox One controllers (controller recommended)
  • Music by Visager
